Other Information.Test Conditions: 25°C, 150 min for batch adsorption; 48 h for prolonged adsorption
Other Information.Additional Info: Adsorption capacity: 60.1 mg/g at 300 mg/L Cr(VI); Reduction rate: 82%
Removal rate: 100% within 20 min; Degradation capacity: 149.0 mg/g at 300 mg/L Rh B

Experimental Validation.Method: Batch adsorption experiments, advanced oxidation process, quenching experiments, EPR analysis
Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: Cr(VI) removal capacity: 60.1 mg/g; Rh B degradation capacity: 149.0 mg/g

Other Information.Additional Info: The MOF-on-MOF structure enhanced catalytic activity and stability via synergistic interactions between Co and Cu species.
